author: COMSOL
description:
This example shows the analysis of a perforated plate loaded into the plastic regime. Part of the example is a benchmark, but the unloading of the plate and residual stresses are also studied.

In a second part of the example, it is shown how a hardening function based on a measured stressâ€“strain curve can be used.
label: elastoplastic_plate.mph
name: root
